verses.verse: And it shall come to <S%H8085>pass<s%>, if you shall listen <S%H8085>diligently<s%> unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H8104>observe<s%> and to <S%H6213>do<s%> all his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%>, that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5414>set<s%> you on <S%H5945>high<s%> above all <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>:

And all these <S%H1293>blessings<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> on <S%H5381>you<s%>, and overtake <S%H8085>you<s%>, if you shall listen unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> shall you be in the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> shall you be in the <S%H7704>field<s%>.

<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> shall be the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H990>body<s%>, and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H127>ground<s%>, and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H929>cattle<s%>, the <S%H7698>increase<s%> of your <S%H504>cows<s%>, and the <S%H6251>flocks<s%> of your <S%H6629>sheep<s%>.
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> shall be your <S%H2935>basket<s%> and your <S%H4863>store<s%>.
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> shall you be when you come <S%H935>in<s%>, and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> shall you be when you go <S%H3318>out<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H5414>cause<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%> that rise <S%H6965>up<s%> against you to be <S%H5062>struck<s%> before your <S%H6440>face<s%>: they shall come <S%H3318>out<s%> against you <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>, and <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1870>ways<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> upon you in your <S%H618>storehouses<s%>, and in all that you <S%H4916>set<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H1288>unto<s%>; and he shall bless you in the <S%H776>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> gives <S%H5414>you<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H6965>establish<s%> you an <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> unto <S%H7650>himself<s%>, as he has sworn unto <S%H8104>you<s%>, if you shall keep the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H1980>walk<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways<s%>.

And all <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> that you are <S%H7121>called<s%> by the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; and they shall be afraid of <S%H3372>you<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall make you <S%H3498>plentiful<s%> in <S%H2896>goods<s%>, in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H990>body<s%>, and in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H127>ground<s%>, in the <S%H127>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%> to give <S%H5414>you<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H6605>open<s%> unto you his <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H214>treasure<s%>, the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H4306>rain<s%> unto your <S%H776>land<s%> in his <S%H6256>season<s%>, and to <S%H1288>bless<s%> all the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand<s%>: and you shall <S%H3867>lend<s%> unto <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and you shall not <S%H3867>borrow<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H5414>make<s%> you the <S%H7218>head<s%>, and not the <S%H2180>tail<s%>; and you shall be above <S%H4605>only<s%>, and you shall not be <S%H4295>beneath<s%>; if that you <S%H8085>listen<s%> unto the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%>, to <S%H8104>observe<s%> and to do <S%H6213>them<s%>:

And you shall not go <S%H5493>aside<s%> from any of the <S%H1697>words<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%>, to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, or to the <S%H8040>left<s%>, to <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> to serve <S%H5647>them<s%>.

But it shall come to <S%H8085>pass<s%>, if you will not listen unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> all his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%>; that all these <S%H7045>curses<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H5381>you<s%>, and overtake you:
<S%H779>Cursed<s%> shall you be in the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H779>cursed<s%> shall you be in the <S%H7704>field<s%>.
<S%H779>Cursed<s%> shall be your <S%H2935>basket<s%> and your <S%H4863>store<s%>.

<S%H779>Cursed<s%> shall be the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H990>body<s%>, and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H127>land<s%>, the <S%H7698>increase<s%> of your <S%H504>cows<s%>, and the <S%H6251>flocks<s%> of your <S%H6629>sheep<s%>.
<S%H779>Cursed<s%> shall you be when you come <S%H935>in<s%>, and <S%H779>cursed<s%> shall you be when you go <S%H3318>out<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H7971>send<s%> upon you <S%H3994>cursing<s%>, <S%H4103>vexation<s%>, and <S%H4045>rebuke<s%>, in all that you <S%H4916>set<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> unto for to <S%H6213>do<s%>, until you be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%>, and until you <S%H6>perish<s%> <S%H4118>quickly<s%>; <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H7455>wickedness<s%> of your <S%H4611>doings<s%>, by which you have forsaken <S%H5800>me<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall make the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> <S%H1692>cleave<s%> unto <S%H3615>you<s%>, until he have consumed you from off the <S%H127>land<s%>, where you <S%H935>go<s%> to possess <S%H3423>it<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H5221>strike<s%> you with a <S%H7829>consumption<s%>, and with a <S%H6920>fever<s%>, and with an <S%H1816>inflammation<s%>, and with an extreme <S%H2746>burning<s%>, and with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and with <S%H7711>blasting<s%>, and with <S%H3420>mildew<s%>; and they shall <S%H7291>pursue<s%> you until you <S%H6>perish<s%>.
And your <S%H8064>heaven<s%> that is over your <S%H7218>head<s%> shall be <S%H5178>brass<s%>, and the <S%H776>earth<s%> that is under you shall be <S%H1270>iron<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H4306>rain<s%> of your <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H80>powder<s%> and <S%H6083>dust<s%>: from <S%H8064>heaven<s%> shall it come <S%H3381>down<s%> upon <S%H8045>you<s%>, until you be destroyed.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H5414>cause<s%> you to be <S%H5062>struck<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%>: you shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> against <S%H5127>them<s%>, and flee <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2189>them<s%>: and shall be removed into all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And your <S%H5038>carcass<s%> shall be <S%H3978>food<s%> unto all <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>air<s%>, and unto the <S%H929>animals<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and no man shall fray them <S%H2729>away<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5221>strike<s%> you with the <S%H7822>boil<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and with the <S%H2914>ulcers<s%>, and with the <S%H1618>scab<s%>, and with the <S%H2775>itch<s%>, whereof you <S%H3201>can<s%> not be <S%H7495>healed<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H5221>strike<s%> you with <S%H7697>madness<s%>, and <S%H5788>blindness<s%>, and <S%H8541>astonishment<s%> of <S%H3824>heart<s%>:

And you shall <S%H4959>grope<s%> at <S%H6672>noonday<s%>, as the <S%H5787>blind<s%> <S%H4959>gropes<s%> in <S%H653>darkness<s%>, and you shall not <S%H6743>prosper<s%> in your <S%H1870>ways<s%>: and you shall be only <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> and <S%H1497>spoiled<s%> <S%H3117>evermore<s%>, and no man shall save <S%H3467>you<s%>.

You shall <S%H781>betroth<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%>, and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> with <S%H1129>her<s%>: you shall build a <S%H1004>house<s%>, and you shall not <S%H3427>live<s%> in <S%H5193>it<s%>: you shall plant a <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>, and shall not gather the grapes <S%H2490>there<s%>.

Your <S%H7794>ox<s%> shall be <S%H2873>slain<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and you shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H2543>there<s%>: your donkey shall be violently taken <S%H1497>away<s%> from before your <S%H6440>face<s%>, and shall not be <S%H7725>restored<s%> to <S%H6629>you<s%>: your sheep shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> unto your <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and you shall have none to rescue <S%H3467>them<s%>.

Your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> unto <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>, and your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%>, and <S%H3616>fail<s%> with longing for them all the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H410>long<s%>: and there shall be no might in your <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

The <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H127>land<s%>, and all your <S%H3018>labors<s%>, shall a <S%H5971>nation<s%> which you <S%H3045>know<s%> not eat <S%H398>up<s%>; and you shall be only <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> and <S%H7533>crushed<s%> <S%H3117>always<s%>:
So that you shall be <S%H7696>mad<s%> for the <S%H4758>sight<s%> of your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> which you shall <S%H7200>see<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H5221>strike<s%> you in the <S%H1290>knees<s%>, and in the <S%H7785>legs<s%>, with a <S%H7451>severe<s%> <S%H7822>boil<s%> that <S%H3201>cannot<s%> be <S%H7495>healed<s%>, from the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of your <S%H7272>foot<s%> unto the top of your <S%H6936>head<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H3212>bring<s%> <S%H4428>you<s%>, and your king which you shall <S%H6965>set<s%> over <S%H1471>you<s%>, unto a nation which neither you nor your <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H3045>known<s%>; and there shall you <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H68>stone<s%>.
And you shall become an <S%H8047>astonishment<s%>, a <S%H4912>proverb<s%>, and a <S%H8148>byword<s%>, among all <S%H5971>nations<s%> where the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall lead <S%H5090>you<s%>.

You shall <S%H3318>carry<s%> <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> into the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and shall <S%H622>gather<s%> but <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H622>in<s%>; for the <S%H697>locust<s%> shall consume <S%H2628>it<s%>.

You shall <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>, and <S%H5647>dress<s%> <S%H8354>them<s%>, but shall neither drink of the <S%H3196>wine<s%>, nor <S%H103>gather<s%> the <S%H8438>grapes<s%>; for the worms shall eat <S%H398>them<s%>.

You shall have olive <S%H2132>trees<s%> throughout all your <S%H1366>coasts<s%>, but you shall not <S%H5480>anoint<s%> yourself with the <S%H8081>oil<s%>; for your <S%H2132>olive<s%> shall cast his <S%H5394>fruit<s%>.
You shall <S%H3205>beget<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, but you shall not enjoy <S%H3212>them<s%>; for they shall go into <S%H7628>captivity<s%>.
All your <S%H6086>trees<s%> and <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H127>land<s%> shall the <S%H6767>locust<s%> <S%H3423>consume<s%>.

The <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that is <S%H7130>inside<s%> you shall get <S%H5927>up<s%> above you <S%H4605>very<s%> <S%H4605>high<s%>; and you shall come <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H4295>very<s%> <S%H4295>low<s%>.
He shall <S%H3867>lend<s%> to <S%H3867>you<s%>, and you shall not lend to <S%H7218>him<s%>: he shall be the head, and you shall be the <S%H2180>tail<s%>.

Moreover all these <S%H7045>curses<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H7291>you<s%>, and shall pursue <S%H5381>you<s%>, and overtake <S%H8045>you<s%>, until you be destroyed; because you <S%H8085>listened<s%> not unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> which he commanded <S%H6680>you<s%>:
And they shall be upon you for a <S%H226>sign<s%> and for a <S%H4159>wonder<s%>, and upon your <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

Because you <S%H5647>serve<s%> not the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with <S%H8057>joyfulness<s%>, and with <S%H2898>gladness<s%> of <S%H3824>heart<s%>, for the abundance of all <S%H7230>things<s%>;

Therefore shall you <S%H5647>serve<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H7971>send<s%> against <S%H7458>you<s%>, in hunger, and in <S%H6772>thirst<s%>, and in <S%H5903>nakedness<s%>, and in <S%H2640>want<s%> of all <S%H5414>things<s%>: and he shall put a <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%> upon your <S%H6677>neck<s%>, until he have destroyed <S%H8045>you<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H5375>bring<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> against you from <S%H7350>far<s%>, from the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, as swift as the <S%H5404>eagle<s%> <S%H1675>flies<s%>; a <S%H1471>nation<s%> whose <S%H3956>tongue<s%> you shall not <S%H8085>understand<s%>;

A <S%H1471>nation<s%> of <S%H5794>fierce<s%> <S%H6440>favor<s%>, which shall not <S%H5375>regard<s%> the <S%H6440>person<s%> of the <S%H2205>old<s%>, nor show <S%H2603>favor<s%> to the <S%H5288>young<s%>:

And he shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H127>land<s%>, until you be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%>: which also shall not <S%H7604>leave<s%> you either <S%H1715>corn<s%>, <S%H8492>wine<s%>, or <S%H3323>oil<s%>, or the <S%H7698>increase<s%> of your <S%H504>cows<s%>, or <S%H6251>flocks<s%> of your <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, until he have destroyed <S%H6>you<s%>.

And he shall <S%H6887>besiege<s%> you in all your <S%H8179>gates<s%>, until your <S%H1364>high<s%> and <S%H1219>fenced<s%> <S%H2346>walls<s%> come <S%H3381>down<s%>, <S%H2004>where<s%> you <S%H982>trusted<s%>, throughout all your <S%H776>land<s%>: and he shall <S%H6887>besiege<s%> you in all your <S%H8179>gates<s%> throughout all your <S%H776>land<s%>, which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has given <S%H5414>you<s%>.

And you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your own <S%H990>body<s%>, the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and of your <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H4692>you<s%>, in the siege, and in the <S%H4689>anguish<s%> with which your <S%H341>enemies<s%> shall distress <S%H6693>you<s%>:

So that the <S%H376>man<s%> that is <S%H7390>tender<s%> among <S%H3966>you<s%>, and very <S%H6028>delicate<s%>, his <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall be <S%H3415>evil<s%> toward his <S%H251>brother<s%>, and toward the <S%H802>wife<s%> of his <S%H2436>bosom<s%>, and toward the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> which he shall <S%H3498>leave<s%>:

So that he will not <S%H5414>give<s%> to <S%H259>any<s%> of them of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> whom he shall <S%H398>eat<s%>: because he has nothing <S%H7604>left<s%> him in the <S%H4692>siege<s%>, and in the <S%H4689>anguish<s%>, with which your <S%H341>enemies<s%> shall <S%H6693>distress<s%> you in all your <S%H8179>gates<s%>.

The <S%H7390>tender<s%> and <S%H6028>delicate<s%> woman among <S%H5254>you<s%>, which would not adventure to <S%H3322>set<s%> the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of her <S%H7272>foot<s%> upon the <S%H776>ground<s%> for <S%H6026>delicateness<s%> and <S%H7391>tenderness<s%>, her <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall be <S%H3415>evil<s%> toward the <S%H376>husband<s%> of her <S%H2436>bosom<s%>, and toward her <S%H1121>son<s%>, and toward her <S%H1323>daughter<s%>,

And toward her young <S%H7988>one<s%> that comes <S%H3318>out<s%> from between her <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and toward her <S%H1121>sons<s%> which she shall <S%H3205>carry<s%>: for she shall <S%H398>eat<s%> them for <S%H2640>want<s%> of all things <S%H5643>secretly<s%> in the <S%H4692>siege<s%> and <S%H4689>anguish<s%>, with which your <S%H341>enemy<s%> shall <S%H6693>distress<s%> you in your <S%H8179>gates<s%>.

If you will not <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H8451>law<s%> that are <S%H3789>written<s%> in this <S%H5612>book<s%>, that you may <S%H3372>fear<s%> this <S%H3513>glorious<s%> and <S%H3372>fearful<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>, THE <S%H3068>LORD<s%> YOUR <S%H430>GOD<s%>;
